attributes.action: Pass a vote of no confidence in the Prime Minister.
attributes.additional_details: The Prime Minister has a unique responsibility for the misleading statements made during the EU referendum and during the last election and subsequently, and has proved wholly incompetent as a leader during the Covid pandemic, causing the avoidable loss of lives and livelihoods; between the two, he has wrought the most enormous damage to the UK socially, culturally, environmentally, economically and as a presence on the world stage able to raise standards for all.
attributes.background: I want the Prime Minister to resign or Parliament to pass a motion of no confidence in him to force him to do so,

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.

You may wish to sign this petition calling for a general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557074
